short_summary: Supply and storage of mixed fertilizers in fields in the Lacombe area, Alberta.
description: Amendment to closing time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 09 March 2023 at 2:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
